name: room1temp
format:
<script src="/myjs/tween-min.js"></script>
<script src="/myjs/steelseries-min.js"></script>
<script>
var radial1;
var setHeat;
var setCool;
var setMin;
var setMax;
var setSize;
    (function(scope){ 
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
            if (typeof(msg.temp) != "undefined") radial1.setValueAnimated(msg.temp);
            if (typeof(msg.thresholdpnt) != "undefined") radial1.setThreshold(msg.thresholdpnt);
            if (typeof(msg.min_gauge) != "undefined") radial1.setMinValue(msg.min_gauge);
            if (typeof(msg.max_gauge) != "undefined") radial1.setMaxValue(msg.max_gauge);
            setCool = msg.coolsetpnt;
            setHeat = msg.heatsetpnt;
            setMin = msg.min_gauge;
            setMax = msg.max_gauge;
            setSize = msg.gauge_size;
        });
    })(scope);

    var sections = [steelseries.Section(setMin, setHeat, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(setHeat, setCool, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(setCool, setMax, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

    areas = [steelseries.Section(setHeat, setCool, 'rgba(80, 220, 100, 0.3)')],
    
    radial1 = new steelseries.Radial('canvasradial1', {
            gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE2,
            // minValue: setMin,
            // maxValue: setMax,
            size: setSize,
            section: sections,
            area: areas,
            unitString: "Degrees C",
            thresholdRising: false,
            userLedVisible: false,
            ledVisible: false,
            useOdometer: false,
            lcdVisible: true,
            lcdDecimals: 1,
            trendVisible: false
        });
                        
    radial1.setFrameDesign(steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL);
    radial1.setValueAnimated(0);
    radial1.blinkUserLed(0);
    radial1.setOdoValue(0);
</script>
<canvas id="canvasradial1" width="401" height="401"></canvas>

name: room5temp
format:
<script src="/myjs/tween-min.js"></script>
<script src="/myjs/steelseries-min.js"></script>
<script>
var radial5;
    (function(scope){ 
        scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
           if (typeof(msg.temp) != "undefined") radial5.setValueAnimated(msg.temp);
           if (typeof(msg.coolsetpnt) != "undefined") radial5.setThreshold(msg.coolsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.heatsetpnt) != "undefined") radial5.setThreshold(msg.heatsetpnt);
           if (typeof(msg.tempname) != "undefined") radial5.setTitleString(msg.tempname);
           if (typeof(msg.userLed) != "undefined") radial5.setUserLedOnOff(msg.userLed);  
           if (typeof(msg.trend) != "undefined")
            {
                if (msg.trend==1)     radial5.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.UP);
                if (msg.trend==0)     radial5.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.STEADY);
                if (msg.trend==-1)    radial5.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.DOWN);
                if (msg.trend==-2)    radial5.setTrend(steelseries.TrendState.OFF);
            }
        });
    })(scope);

    var sections = [steelseries.Section(10, 18, 'rgba(0, 0, 220, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(0, 220, 0, 0.3)'),
                        steelseries.Section(24, 30, 'rgba(220, 0, 0, 0.3)') ],

            // Define one area
    areas = [steelseries.Section(18, 24, 'rgba(80, 220, 100, 0.3)')],
    
    radial5 = new steelseries.Radial('canvasradial5', {
            gaugeType: steelseries.GaugeType.TYPE2,
            minValue: 10,
            maxValue: 30,
            size: 235,
            section: sections,
            area: areas,
            unitString: "Degrees C",
            threshold: 22,
            thresholdRising: false,
            userLedVisible: false,
            ledVisible: false,
            useOdometer: false,
            lcdVisible: true,
            lcdDecimals: 1,
            trendVisible: false
        });
                        
    radial5.setFrameDesign(steelseries.FrameDesign.BLACK_METAL);
    radial5.setValueAnimated(0);
    radial5.blinkUserLed(0);
    radial5.setOdoValue(0);


</script>

<canvas id="canvasradial5" width="401" height="401"></canvas>
